activities:
Seagil Software Company provides internet based computer applications for charter and corporate flight departments.

The subject computer applications include the storage of personal information about client flight crews and passengers.  Seagil has access to that information strictly for the purpose of supporting the applications in the capacity of a data processor.
eucountries: Germany, Greece, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Flight Crew and Passenger information stored within the application database.
recoursemech:
Seagil commits to cooperate and comply with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) in the investigation and resolution of unresolved complaints brought under the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor Framework.
Seagil commits to cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) in the investigation and resolution of unresolved complaints brought under the U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor Framework.
